Package com.mway.bluerange.android.sdk.core.scanning

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    BeaconMessageScanner
    A beacon message scanner can be used to scan beacon messages.
    BeaconMessageScannerBluetoothRestarter  
    BeaconMessageScannerConfig
    This class encapsulates the BeaconMessageScanner's configuration.
    BeaconMessageScannerSimulator
    This class implements the IBeaconMessageScanner interface and can be used to simulate incoming BeaconMessages.
    IBeaconMessageScanner
    This interface defines the specification of a beacon message scanner.
